ground_truth_reviews.comment: The `PostFormatter` is being created and configured on every single request. This is highly inefficient as the formatter's initialization is an expensive operation, causing unnecessary latency and resource consumption under load. The formatter should be instantiated once at the module level and reused for all requests.

title: feat: Add formatted post endpoint
body: This change introduces a new endpoint `/posts/{post_id}/formatted` to return a specially formatted version of a post. This will be used to provide different content views for clients.
